MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA13 and KA24 postcode areas of Kilwinning and Dalry. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:03pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault repairs following broken equipment being located. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:48pm on 14th November
